record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term="introexport" and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"

brief.brief: The export program exports certain fields within a record to an external file for use with other programs, reporting tools, etc.

detail.detail: The export utility is combined with the database mass unload utility.
When you press the mass Unload key in a record list, Service Manager displays an unload description.
If you select Expert as the unload mode, and press Export, the export utility displays the export descriptor record.
The export utility then exports each record on the search list in raw format, according to the entries on the export descriptor record.
It validates the export descriptor record before performing an add or update.
The export utility can run in either foreground or background.
The unload description defines the external dataset name to export to and the create/append options.
